name: Andrii Serbeniuk
about:
2+ years of experience in Android Development.
Extensive knowledge of Android SDK and google architecture components.
Experience with front-end and back-end development (Firebase/Kotlin/Java). Strong technical background.

skills.name: Developing Android applications using Kotlin and Java languages
Clean Architecture, MVP, MVI, MVVM patterns and SOLID principles
Firebase (storage, database, firestore, analytics etc.), GeoFirestore
MotionLayout, Lottine, Transition API, Groupie, CustomView etc.

projects.name: Amplituda (open source)
projects.description: Android library that calculates amplitudes from audio and provides data to draw

projects.name: AudioTool (open source)
projects.description: Android library that provides audio manipulation functions like increase/decrease speed, pitch, volume, bass, etc. Library also provides cut, noise remover, and other interesting and helpfull functions
